Manages command history for undo/redo functionality.

CommandHistory(int)

Creates a new command history with the specified maximum size.

public CommandHistory(int maxHistorySize = 100)

Parameters

maxHistorySize int

Maximum number of commands to keep in history. 0 = unlimited.

Methods

Clear()

Clears all command history.

public void Execute(IGraphCommand command)

Parameters

command IGraphCommand

Redo()

Redoes the last undone command.

public bool Redo()

Returns

bool

True if a command was redone, false if there was nothing to redo.

Undo()

Undoes the last command.

public bool Undo()

Returns

bool

True if a command was undone, false if there was nothing to undo.
